    • Field Detail

      • MINIMUM_TIMEOUT

        private static final long MINIMUM_TIMEOUT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROUNDING_SECOND

        private static final long ROUNDING_SECOND
        We add a second to the timeout if the user configures a 1-second timeout.

        This ensures the expiry time displayed to the user is always at least 1 second, even after it is rounded down.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • createHttpTransactionManager

      • getTransactionTimeout

        private Duration getTransactionTimeout()
        We are going to ensure the minimum timeout is 2 seconds. The timeout value is communicated to the user in seconds rounded down, meaning if a user set a 1 second timeout, he would be told there was less than 1 second remaining before he would need to renew the timeout.
